nodes.title: ناسا ١
The ancient city of Chinguetti, Mauritania, in the Sahara was once a rich center in the salt trade before the arrival of European sailing ships to the African coast.
Soldat méhariste en Mauritanie. (Photo by Michel HUET/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images)
Portrait d'un chef de village en Mauritanie. (Photo by Michel HUET/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images)
OASIS EN MAURITANIE REGION DE CHINGUETTI (Photo by Michel RENAUDEAU/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images)
Mauritanien présentant un manuscrit enluminé du XIIè siècle à Chinguetti, circa 1990, Mauritanie. (Photo by Jean-Luc MANAUD/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images)

Mauritanian musician Dimi Mint Abba (1958 - 2011) sings and plays an ardin, a 14-string harp-lute, against a white background in the studio, New York, New York, September 24, 1993. (Photo by Jack Vartoogian/Getty Images)
Mauritanian National Brigade In Mauritania In December, 1996. (Photo by Marc DEVILLE/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images)
Mauritanian National Brigade In Mauritania In December, 1996. (Photo by Marc DEVILLE/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images)
Mauritanian National Brigade In Mauritania In December, 1996. (Photo by Marc DEVILLE/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images)
Mauritania, Senegal river, sunset - CIRCA 1900: Mauritania - Senegal river, sunset. (Photo By DEA / C. SAPPA/De Agostini via Getty Images)
Mauritania - Erg Ouarane: Adrar plateau in Erg Ouarane, a desert of sand and dunes. Nomad camp. (Photo by michel Setboun/Corbis via Getty Images)
MOUDJERIA DANS LA REGION DE TAGANT, MAURITANIE. (Photo by Maurice ASCANI/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images)
MAURITANIE,MINE DE SEL DE SEBKET EJ JILL  (Photo by Michel RENAUDEAU/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images)
MAURITANIE,MANUFACTURE DE TAPIS A NOUAKCHOTT (Photo by Michel RENAUDEAU/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images)
MAURITANIE, NOUHADIBOU. (Photo by Michel RENAUDEAU/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images)
MAURITANIE - PECHE SECHAGE DU POISSON MAURITANIE - PECHE SECHAGE DU POISSON. (Photo by Michel RENAUDEAU/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images)
MAURITANIA - JANUARY 19: Illustration: Mauritania on January 19, 1993 - Craftsmen. (Photo by Xavier ROSSI/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images)
Elevage de dromadaires se baignant dans une rivière rouge à Oualata, Mauritanie. (Photo by JEAN-LUC MANAUD/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images)
CARAVANE DE FEMMES DANS LA REGION DE NEMA, MAURITANIE. (Photo by Maurice ASCANI/Gamma-Rapho via Getty Images)
Boats from fishing village outside Nouakchott, Mauritania ( George Steinmetz ).
A small group of French tourists retrace ancient caravan routes between dying Mauritanian oasis towns (George Steinmetz)

nodes.title: مختارات من كتابات أحمد القاري حول الفرنسة
nodes.excerpt:
بعد سنوات من نقاش القضية اللغوية والاطلاع على تجارب عشرات البلدان، خلصت إلى الآتي: اللغة قضية هوية وكرامة. لا تقبل نقاش الجدوى. ولا المقاربات النفعية الباردة.
الموقف من اللغة عاطف…
